00508                 return NULL;

00511         /* select a "subminor" number (part of a minor number) */
00512         down (&minor_table_mutex);
00513         for (minor = 0; minor < MAX_DEVICES; ++minor) {
00514                 if (minor_table[minor] == NULL)
00515                         break;
00516         }
00517         if (minor >= MAX_DEVICES) {
00518                 info ("Too many devices plugged in, can not handle this device.");
00519                 goto exit;

00521 
00522         /* allocate memory for our device state and intialize it */
00523         dev = kmalloc (sizeof(struct usb_scs_250), GFP_KERNEL);
00524         if (dev == NULL) {

00541         for (i = 0; i < iface_desc->bNumEndpoints; ++i) {
00542                 endpoint = &iface_desc->endpoint[i];
00543 
00544                 if ((endpoint->bEndpointAddress & 0x80) &&
00545                     ((endpoint->bmAttributes & 3) == 0x02)) {
00546                         /* we found a bulk in endpoint */
00547                         buffer_size = endpoint->wMaxPacketSize;
00548                         dev->bulk_in_size = buffer_size;
00549                         dev->bulk_in_endpointAddr = endpoint->bEndpointAddress;
00550                         dev->bulk_in_buffer = kmalloc (buffer_size, GFP_KERNEL);

00552                                 err("Couldn't allocate bulk_in_buffer");
00553                                 goto error;
00554                         }
00555                 }
00556                 
00557                 if (((endpoint->bEndpointAddress & 0x80) == 0x00) &&
00558                     ((endpoint->bmAttributes & 3) == 0x02)) {
00559                         /* we found a bulk out endpoint */
00560                         dev->write_urb = usb_alloc_urb(0);
00561                         if (!dev->write_urb) {
00562                                 err("No free urbs available");
00563                                 goto error;
00564                         }

00571                                 goto error;

00574                                       usb_sndbulkpipe(udev, 
00575                                                       endpoint->bEndpointAddress),

00391

00394                 dbg (__FUNCTION__ " - already writing");
00395                 goto exit;
00396         }
00397 
00398         /* we can only write as much as 1 urb will hold */
00399         bytes_written = (count > dev->bulk_out_size) ? 
00400                                 dev->bulk_out_size : count;
00401 
00402         /* copy the data from userspace into our urb */

00405                 retval = -EFAULT;

00410                              dev->write_urb->transfer_buffer);
00411

00414                       usb_sndbulkpipe(dev->udev, dev->bulk_out_endpointAddr),
00415                       dev->write_urb->transfer_buffer, bytes_written,
00416                       scs_250_write_bulk_callback, dev);
00417 
00418         /* send the data out the bulk port */
00419         retval = usb_submit_urb(dev->write_urb);
00420         if (retval) {
00421                 err(__FUNCTION__ " - failed submitting write urb, error %d",
00422                     retval);
00423         } else {
00424                 retval = bytes_written;
00425         }
00426

00428         /* unlock the device */
